# nonce

**Instance Property**

An arbitrary number that the signed response playload includes.

## Declaration

```swift
var nonce: Data? { get set }
```

## Discussion

A [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKIdentityAuthorizationController] treats this value as opaque, and has a maximum allowed size of 64 bytes. Your app’s server needs to use the same `nonce` value when decrypting and verifying the response.

Set this property before you invoke [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKIdentityAuthorizationController/requestDocument(_:completion:)].

## Configuring an identity request

- **descriptor**: The description of the document the app requests.
- **merchantIdentifier**: A value that represents the merchant that makes the request.
